review: Love it!.Got this from somewhere else,and already had it programmed with Kodi (xbmc) I'm sure I could've done the install myself,but for under 60 bucks,I'd rather not risk screwing something up big time.(if you don't know what Kodi/XBMC is,look it up-it's fantastic) the simplicity of having that program along with all the other favs like Netflix,Plex,HBO Go,etc (HBO Go-not if you're a comcast customer that is,no support as of right now) Nice simple,easy to use,and navigate.Heck,I'd even recommend this for the non tech savvy at this point,and there is a SLIGHT learning curve to Kodi,but nothing too major.There are also ways to "side load' Android apps,but I wont get into that right now.The wi fi is nice and strong with this stick too,we have an old house with lathe and plaster walls,ad this seems to do just fine with the router about 30 ft away (and the router is an old G model) so far so good!
